review: LOVE IT.  Don't know how it compares to other similar products.  But it works as advertised.  The voice activation feature works great.  I love the apps, games, videos, up to date news and sports (ESPN) stories.  Still finding out all that it does.  So far so good.  It does not have a on off button.  But, after 30 minutes of inactivity, it shuts off automatically.  My daughter is already trying to claim it for her room.
